title: Twenty-Four Hours of Freedom
description: THIS IS A PREVIOUSLY- PUBLISHED EDITION OF ASIN B01MY861GS.What would you do if you found out today was your last day of freedom? Newly reunited best friends Owen and Makayla had planned to spend a normal day in the city. . .until Owen gets a call that he’s to remain where he is at Makayla’s house. In 24 hours, he will be picked up on a warrant and taken to jail over a business dispute that’s turned very ugly. How will the two spend Owen's last 24 hours?
author: Y.M. Nelson
